name: dev-productivity-assistant
description: AI-powered developer productivity assistant with MCP integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mcp"
scripts.dev:mcp: concurrently "npm run dev:mcp:code-quality" "npm run dev:mcp:git-analytics" "npm run dev:mcp:knowledge-graph"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:mcp
scripts.build:mcp: cd mcp-servers/code-quality && npm run build && cd ../git-analytics && npm run build && cd ../knowledge-graph && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../mcp-servers && npm install
scripts.neo4j:stop: docker stop dev-productivity-neo4j && docker rm dev-productivity-neo4j

author: Claude Code Assistant
